verbs.description: as [V: vaping] surges teen cigarette smoking ticks up after decades of decline teen cigarette smoking rates are on the rise critics have warned a surge in vaping may cause nicotine - addicted kids to migrate to conventional cigarettes centers for disease control and prevention commissioner cdc cnbc food and drug administration cigarette juul youth risk behavior survey smoking rand corporation fda rand corp national youth tobacco survey scott gottlieb
